name: Doge Whale
description: The DWHL token, a DRC20 token, is a cryptocurrency designed for integration into the economy of a Massively Multiplayer Online Role-Playing Game (MMORPG). In this use case, we explore the application of DWHL tokens as a medium of exchange for purchasing in-game tools and assets in an MMORPG. The integration of DWHL tokens aims to enhance the gaming experience by introducing decentralized financial elements into the virtual world
